mapper.sql:
qu.id, qu.title, qu.created_time, qu.quest_cate_id, qu.start_time, qu.end_time, qu.limit_time, qu.total_amt, qu.left_amt, qu.award, qu.final_award, qu.contact_name, qu.contact_phone, qu.description, qu.quest_detail, qu.url, qu.memo, qu.offline,

mapper.update:
update quest
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
quest_cate_id = #{questCateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
limit_time = #{limitTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_amt = #{totalAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
left_amt = #{leftAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
award = #{award,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quest_detail = #{questDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
offline = #{offline,jdbcType=BIT},
province_id = #{provinceId},
city_id = #{cityId},
region_id = #{regionId},
college_id = #{collegeId},
school_id = #{schoolId},
final_award = #{finalAward},
member_id = #{memberId},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT left_amt FROM quest WHERE id = #{questId} FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE quest SET left_amt = left_amt - 1 WHERE id = #{questId}
